description: This file defines the Header component for a React frontend application, handling navigation, favorites, and sign-out actions.

methods.name: Header({ onOpenFavorites, onNavigateHome, children })
methods.description: React functional component rendering the application header with brand and action buttons.

methods.name: goHome
methods.description: Navigates to the home page or calls the provided callback.

methods.name: openFav
methods.description: Opens the favorites view or navigates to the favorites page.

methods.name: onSignOut
methods.description: Signs out the user and navigates to the sign-in page.

ctags.name: Header
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Header({ onOpenFavorites, onNavigateHome, children }) {$/
